text: The University of North Carolina at Greensboro is a public university in Greensboro, North Carolina. The university has about 18,502 students. It was founded in 1891. The current chancellor of the university is Linda P. Brady. ==Sports== The athletics teams of the university are called the Spartans. They have 16 varsity teams and they compete in the Southern Conference. ==Other websites== *University of North Carolina at Greensboro's Official website *UNC Greensboro Spartans' Official athletics website Category:Colleges and universities in North Carolina Category:Greensboro, North Carolina Category:1891 establishments in the United States Category:19th-century establishments in North Carolina
title: University of North Carolina at Greensboro
